IRCDaemon.name: Codec IRC Channel
IRCDaemon.post: Lol, the guy we just locked out of his computer's been spamming me
No way are we giving him his password until he pays up.
Hey, speaking of being locked out of things
What, don't tell me you want to get locked out of your computer?
Funny joke. I've just refreshed my VM and a lot of my nodes went missing.
Can I get a link to the asset server?
You remember your login details, yeah?
Of course, I keep it in my head.
